_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Bonjour Tremblant!

Weather conditions will vary throughout the day, and ski conditions may change accordingly across the mountain. Our team has prepared the terrain with these conditions in mind, and we’re pleased to offer excellent skiing despite the challenges.
 
Due to today’s weather conditions, Versant Soleil and Le Edge will be closed to ensure the safety of our guests. We appreciate your understanding and continued support as we make these decisions with your safety in mind. 

First Tracks: Access to designated lifts, on North and South side, as early as 7:45 am.

Terrain Park fans will be happy to hear that all 4 parks are open.

Alpine Touring is available today, with access to 15 sections across the mountain.

Join us on the slopes and enjoy a fun and memorable day on the snow!

Mountain safety tip of the week: Be careful when using the ski lifts.
Knowing how to board ski lifts is essential to ensure the safety of all users.
 
Snow fall is recorded daily at 5 a.m from mid-mountain at North Side (550 m / 1,800 ft). This data, based on 24 hours, provides a picture of on-mountain conditions. Actual accumulation may differ from the official report. Be aware of changing conditions. Lifts and trails exist in a mountain environment and may close due to weather, usage and/or special maintenance.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport: This Friday, weather conditions will vary throughout the day, and ski conditions may change accordingly across the mountain. Versant Soleil and Le Edge will be closed to ensure the safety of our guests. First Tracks starting at 7:45 a.m. on the north and south side. 4 Terrain Parks and 15 Alpine Touring sections available for guests. We appreciate your understanding and continued support as we make these decisions with your safety in mind.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReportFrench: Ce vendredi, les conditions météos varieront au cours de la journée, et les conditions de ski pourront évoluer en conséquence sur l’ensemble de la montagne. Versant Soleil & Le Edge seront fermés afin d’assurer la sécurité de nos invités. Les premières traces commenceront à 7 h 45,  tant du côté nord que du côté sud. 4 parc à neige, et 15 secteurs de Rando Alpine disponible pour les invités. Bon ski!
